name: JWT token validation and decoding

steps.name: When I successfully login with valid credentials "admin@invitedekho.com" and "Test@123456"
And I extract the JWT token from the response
Then I should be able to decode the token payload
And the token should contain user identification information
And the token should have proper expiration time

fullName: InviteDeKho Login API Testing: JWT token validation and decoding
